oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni and Tamme contribute words and sentences, mainly furnishing the !kun names of animals that they saw in the South African Museum as well as some other vocabulary. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: September 1st, 1879, South African Museum (from !nanni and Tamme)
